title: Alternative definition of the value of a function

blocks.name: dfafv2
blocks.content: Alternative definition of ` ( F ''' A ) ` using ` ( F `` A ) ` directly. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2017.) (Revised by AV, 25-Aug-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfafv2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cafv(c0, c1), cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wdfat(c0, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4ri(cafv(c0, c1), cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wdfat(c0, c1)), cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))), caiota(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))
  mptru(wceq(cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))), caiota(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))))
  ifeqda(cfv(c0, c1), universe, caiota(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), wtru, wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))))
  syl5eq(cfv(c0, c1), caiota(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), cio(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), wa(wtru, wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))))
  df-fv(hs0, c0, c1)
  sylib(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cio(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), caiota(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))
  simprr(wtru, wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))
  reuaiotaiota(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))
  eqcomd(universe, caiota(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), wa(wtru, wn(wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))))))
  sylib(wa(wtru, wn(wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))))), wceq(caiota(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), universe), wn(weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))))
  adantl(wtru, wn(wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))), wn(weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))))
  con3i(wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))
  ancri(weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  eubrdm(hs0, c1, c0)
  aiotavb(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wdfat(c0, c1)), cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))))), wb(wdfat(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0))))))
  dfdfat2(hs0, c0, c1)
  ifbi(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wdfat(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(hs0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs0)))))
  df-afv(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm dfafv2(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ''' c1)= if(c0[defAt]c1,(c0 ` c1), ùïå)
} = {
  3eqtr4ri((c0 ''' c1), if(c0[defAt]c1,(c0 ` c1), ùïå), if((c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0)),(c0 ` c1), ùïå), iota'(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))
  mptru(if((c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0)),(c0 ` c1), ùïå)= iota'(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))
  ifeqda((c0 ` c1), universe, iota'(hs0, c1[c0]hs0), wtru, (c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0)))
  syl5eq((c0 ` c1), iota'(hs0, c1[c0]hs0), iota(hs0, c1[c0]hs0), (T ‚àß(c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))))
  df-fv(hs0, c0, c1)
  sylib((T ‚àß(c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))), iota(hs0, c1[c0]hs0)= iota'(hs0, c1[c0]hs0), ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))
  simprr(wtru, c1 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))
  reuaiotaiota(hs0, c1[c0]hs0)
  eqcomd(universe, iota'(hs0, c1[c0]hs0), (T ‚àß ¬¨(c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))))
  sylib((T ‚àß ¬¨(c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))), iota'(hs0, c1[c0]hs0)= ùïå, ¬¨ ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))
  adantl(wtru, ¬¨(c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0)), ¬¨ ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))
  con3i((c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0)), ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))
  ancri(‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0), c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  eubrdm(hs0, c1, c0)
  aiotavb(hs0, c1[c0]hs0)
  ax-mp(if(c0[defAt]c1,(c0 ` c1), ùïå)= if((c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0)),(c0 ` c1), ùïå), (c0[defAt]c1 ‚Üî(c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0))))
  dfdfat2(hs0, c0, c1)
  ifbi((c0 ` c1), universe, c0[defAt]c1, (c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß ‚àÉ!(hs0, c1[c0]hs0)))
  df-afv(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: afveq12d
blocks.content: Equality deduction for function value, analogous to ~ fveq12d . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)

blocks.name: afveq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for function value, analogous to ~ fveq1 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2017.)

blocks.name: afveq2
blocks.content: Equality theorem for function value, analogous to ~ fveq1 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2017.)

blocks.name: nfafv
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for function value, analogous to ~ nffv . To prove a deduction version of this analogous to ~ nffvd is not easily possible because a deduction version of ~ nfdfat cannot be shown easily. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)

blocks.name: csbafv12g
blocks.content: Move class substitution in and out of a function value, analogous to ~ csbfv12 , with a direct proof proposed by Mario Carneiro, analogous to ~ csbov123 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 23-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbafv12g(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s0, c0, cafv(c2, c3)), cafv(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wceq(csb(s0, c0, cafv(c2, c3)), cafv(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cafv(c2, c3)), cafv(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))))
  eqeq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cafv(c2, c3)), cafv(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), csb(s0, c0, cafv(c2, c3)), cafv(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, cafv(c2, c3))
  afveq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c3)
  csbief(s0, cv(hs0), cafv(c2, c3), cafv(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)))
  vex(hs0)
  nfafv(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  afveq12d(c2, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(csb(s0, c0, cafv(c2, c3)), cafv(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm csbafv12g(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí[c0 / s0](c2 ''' c3)=([c0 / s0]c2 '''[c0 / s0]c3))
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, [c0 / s0](c2 ''' c3)=([c0 / s0]c2 '''[c0 / s0]c3), [hs0 / s0](c2 ''' c3)=([hs0 / s0]c2 '''[hs0 / s0]c3))
  eqeq12d([hs0 / s0](c2 ''' c3), ([hs0 / s0]c2 '''[hs0 / s0]c3), [c0 / s0](c2 ''' c3), ([c0 / s0]c2 '''[c0 / s0]c3), hs0 = c0)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, (c2 ''' c3))
  afveq12d([hs0 / s0]c2, [hs0 / s0]c3, [c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c3, hs0 = c0)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, c3)
  csbief(s0, hs0, (c2 ''' c3), ([hs0 / s0]c2 '''[hs0 / s0]c3))
  vex(hs0)
  nfafv(s0, [hs0 / s0]c2, [hs0 / s0]c3)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c3)
  afveq12d(c2, c3, [hs0 / s0]c2, [hs0 / s0]c3, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w([c0 / s0](c2 ''' c3)=([c0 / s0]c2 '''[c0 / s0]c3))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: afvfundmfveq
blocks.content: If a class is a function restricted to a member of its domain, then the function value for this member is equal for both definitions. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)

blocks.name: afvnfundmuv
blocks.content: If a set is not in the domain of a class or the class is not a function restricted to the set, then the function value for this set is the universe. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)

blocks.name: ndmafv
blocks.content: The value of a class outside its domain is the universe, compare with ~ ndmfv . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)

blocks.name: afvvdm
blocks.content: If the function value of a class for an argument is a set, the argument is contained in the domain of the class. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)

blocks.name: nfunsnafv
blocks.content: If the restriction of a class to a singleton is not a function, its value is the universe, compare with ~ nfunsn . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)

blocks.name: afvvfunressn
blocks.content: If the function value of a class for an argument is a set, the class restricted to the singleton of the argument is a function. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)

blocks.name: afvprc
blocks.content: A function's value at a proper class is the universe, compare with ~ fvprc . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)

blocks.name: afvvv
blocks.content: If a function's value at an argument is a set, the argument is also a set. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)

blocks.name: afvpcfv0
blocks.content: If the value of the alternative function at an argument is the universe, the function's value at this argument is the empty set. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm afvpcfv0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls))
} = {
  sylbi(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wdfat(c0, c1)), universe))
  eqeq1i(cafv(c0, c1), universe, cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wdfat(c0, c1)))
  dfafv2(c0, c1)
  sylbi(wceq(cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wdfat(c0, c1)), universe), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls), wo(wa(wdfat(c0, c1), wceq(universe, cfv(c0, c1))), wa(wn(wdfat(c0, c1)), wceq(universe, universe))))
  bitri(wceq(cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wdfat(c0, c1)), universe), wo(wa(wdfat(c0, c1), wceq(universe, cfv(c0, c1))), wa(wn(wdfat(c0, c1)), wceq(universe, universe))), wceq(universe, cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wdfat(c0, c1))))
  eqcom(cif(cfv(c0, c1), universe, wdfat(c0, c1)), universe)
  eqif(universe, cfv(c0, c1), universe, wdfat(c0, c1))
  jaoi(wa(wdfat(c0, c1), wceq(universe, cfv(c0, c1))), wa(wn(wdfat(c0, c1)), wceq(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls))
  adantl(wdfat(c0, c1), wceq(universe, cfv(c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls))
  eqcoms(universe, cfv(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls))
  fveqvfvv(c0, c1, emptycls)
  adantr(wn(wdfat(c0, c1)), wceq(universe, universe), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls))
  necon1bi(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls, wdfat(c0, c1))
  sylibr(wne(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls), wdfat(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
  fvfundmfvn0(c0, c1)
  df-dfat(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm afvpcfv0(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ''' c1)= ùïå ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= ‚àÖ)
} = {
  sylbi((c0 ''' c1)= ùïå, (c0 ` c1)= ‚àÖ, if(c0[defAt]c1,(c0 ` c1), ùïå)= ùïå)
  eqeq1i((c0 ''' c1), universe, if(c0[defAt]c1,(c0 ` c1), ùïå))
  dfafv2(c0, c1)
  sylbi(if(c0[defAt]c1,(c0 ` c1), ùïå)= ùïå, (c0 ` c1)= ‚àÖ, ((c0[defAt]c1 ‚àß ùïå =(c0 ` c1))‚à®(¬¨ c0[defAt]c1 ‚àß ùïå = ùïå)))
  bitri(if(c0[defAt]c1,(c0 ` c1), ùïå)= ùïå, ((c0[defAt]c1 ‚àß ùïå =(c0 ` c1))‚à®(¬¨ c0[defAt]c1 ‚àß ùïå = ùïå)), ùïå = if(c0[defAt]c1,(c0 ` c1), ùïå))
  eqcom(if(c0[defAt]c1,(c0 ` c1), ùïå), universe)
  eqif(universe, (c0 ` c1), universe, c0[defAt]c1)
  jaoi((c0[defAt]c1 ‚àß ùïå =(c0 ` c1)), (¬¨ c0[defAt]c1 ‚àß ùïå = ùïå), (c0 ` c1)= ‚àÖ)
  adantl(c0[defAt]c1, ùïå =(c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c1)= ‚àÖ)
  eqcoms(universe, (c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c1)= ‚àÖ)
  fveqvfvv(c0, c1, emptycls)
  adantr(¬¨ c0[defAt]c1, ùïå = ùïå, (c0 ` c1)= ‚àÖ)
  necon1bi((c0 ` c1), emptycls, c0[defAt]c1)
  sylibr((c0 ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, c0[defAt]c1, (c1 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß Fun((c0 |` { c1 }))))
  fvfundmfvn0(c0, c1)
  df-dfat(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: afvnufveq
blocks.content: The value of the alternative function at a set as argument equals the function's value at this argument. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)

blocks.name: afvvfveq
blocks.content: The value of the alternative function at a set as argument equals the function's value at this argument. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)

blocks.name: afv0fv0
blocks.content: If the value of the alternative function at an argument is the empty set, the function's value at this argument is the empty set. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)

blocks.name: afvfvn0fveq
blocks.content: If the function's value at an argument is not the empty set, it equals the value of the alternative function at this argument. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)

blocks.name: afv0nbfvbi
blocks.content: The function's value at an argument is an element of a set if and only if the value of the alternative function at this argument is an element of that set, if the set does not contain the empty set. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm afv0nbfvbi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wnel(emptycls, c0), wb(wcel(cafv(c1, c2), c0), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0)))
} = {
  impbid2(wnel(emptycls, c0), wcel(cafv(c1, c2), c0), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0))
  mpcom(wcel(cafv(c1, c2), c0), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0), wceq(cafv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  afvvfveq(c1, c2, c0)
  biimpd(wceq(cafv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cafv(c1, c2), c0), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0))
  eleq1(cafv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, c2), c0)
  pm2.43d(wnel(emptycls, c0), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0), wcel(cafv(c1, c2), c0))
  ex(wnel(emptycls, c0), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0), wi(wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0), wcel(cafv(c1, c2), c0)))
  4syl(wa(wnel(emptycls, c0), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0)), wi(wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0), wcel(cafv(c1, c2), c0)), wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wa(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wfun(cres(c1, csn(c2)))), wceq(cafv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  ancoms(wnel(emptycls, c0), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0), wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
  elnelne2(cfv(c1, c2), c0, emptycls)
  fvfundmfvn0(c1, c2)
  sylbir(wa(wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wfun(cres(c1, csn(c2)))), wceq(cafv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wdfat(c1, c2))
  df-dfat(c1, c2)
  afvfundmfveq(c1, c2)
  biimpd(wceq(cafv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0), wcel(cafv(c1, c2), c0))
  eqcoms(cafv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, c2), wb(wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0), wcel(cafv(c1, c2), c0)))
  eleq1(cfv(c1, c2), cafv(c1, c2), c0)
}

thm afv0nbfvbi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÖ ‚àâ c0 ‚Üí((c1 ''' c2)‚àà c0 ‚Üî(c1 ` c2)‚àà c0))
} = {
  impbid2(‚àÖ ‚àâ c0, (c1 ''' c2)‚àà c0, (c1 ` c2)‚àà c0)
  mpcom((c1 ''' c2)‚àà c0, (c1 ` c2)‚àà c0, (c1 ''' c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  afvvfveq(c1, c2, c0)
  biimpd((c1 ''' c2)=(c1 ` c2), (c1 ''' c2)‚àà c0, (c1 ` c2)‚àà c0)
  eleq1((c1 ''' c2), (c1 ` c2), c0)
  pm2.43d(‚àÖ ‚àâ c0, (c1 ` c2)‚àà c0, (c1 ''' c2)‚àà c0)
  ex(‚àÖ ‚àâ c0, (c1 ` c2)‚àà c0, ((c1 ` c2)‚àà c0 ‚Üí(c1 ''' c2)‚àà c0))
  4syl((‚àÖ ‚àâ c0 ‚àß(c1 ` c2)‚àà c0), ((c1 ` c2)‚àà c0 ‚Üí(c1 ''' c2)‚àà c0), (c1 ` c2)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c2 ‚àà dom(c1)‚àß Fun((c1 |` { c2 }))), (c1 ''' c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  ancoms(‚àÖ ‚àâ c0, (c1 ` c2)‚àà c0, (c1 ` c2)‚â† ‚àÖ)

thm afvfv0bi(class c0, class c1) {

  ioran(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe))
  impcom(wn(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), emptycls)), wn(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe)), wn(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls)))
  syl(wn(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe)), wi(wn(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), emptycls)), wn(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls))), wceq(cafv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c1)))
  sylbir(wn(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), universe)), wceq(cafv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c1)), wne(cafv(c0, c1), universe))
  df-ne(cafv(c0, c1), universe)
  afvnufveq(c0, c1)
  biimpd(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c1)), wn(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), emptycls)), wn(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls)))
  notbid(wceq(cafv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c1)), wceq(cafv(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls))
  eqeq1(cafv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c1), emptycls)
